Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to enabling public employers to offer certain temporary retirement incentives for certain public employees
Summary: Enables public employers to offer an age fifty-five with ten years of service or age fifty with twenty-five years of service temporary retirement incentives for certain public employees.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to enabling public employers to offer certain temporary retirement incentives for certain public employees
